title: Identify the Reactants
text: Start by identifying the reactants in the given chemical equation. Look for the substances on the left side of the arrow.

title: Count Carbon Atoms
text: Count the number of carbon atoms in the reactant C8H18. Remember, the subscript indicates the number of atoms.

title: Count Hydrogen Atoms
text: Now, count the number of hydrogen atoms in the reactant C8H18. Use the subscript to determine the number of hydrogen atoms.

title: Count Oxygen Atoms
text: Next, count the number of oxygen atoms in the reactant O2. The subscript will help you find the number of oxygen atoms.

title: Verify Atom Count
text: Verify that you have counted all the atoms correctly: C $$=$$ $$8$$, H $$=$$ $$18$$, O $$=$$ $$2$$. Ensure that these numbers match your calculations.
